A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I made the mistake of watching this film 3 times before coming to terms with the fact that this film did not work. Half the movie is very boring\, and the climax and ending do a very little to bring any life to the film. The one action scene in the film\, yes the one action scene in the movie\, is underwhelming and poorly choreographed. There are very forced and uninspired plot points that do not say anything new about our \"new\" characters. If I could rename this film I would call it Star Wars: \"Running out of fuel\" because that is really what the whole movie is a bout.
